trans-unit.source: Describes the original settings of the <see cref="T:System.Runtime.InteropServices.TYPEFLAGS" /> in the COM type library from which the type was imported.
trans-unit.target: 描述匯入這個型別之來源 COM 型別程式庫中 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.InteropServices.TYPEFLAGS" /> 的原始設定。

trans-unit.source: `TypeLibTypeFlags` is used along with the <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.TypeLibTypeAttribute>.
trans-unit.target: `TypeLibTypeFlags` 使用連同<xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.TypeLibTypeAttribute>。

trans-unit.source: The flags are retained for reference only.
trans-unit.target: 參考只會保留旗標。

trans-unit.source: They are not used by the common language runtime.
trans-unit.target: 它們不會使用通用語言執行平台。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see `TYPEFLAGS` in the MSDN library.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱`TYPEFLAGS`MSDN library 中。

trans-unit.source: The class supports aggregation.
trans-unit.target: 類別支援彙總 (Aggregation)。

trans-unit.source: A type description that describes an <see langword="Application" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 描述 <see langword="Application" /> 物件的型別描述。

trans-unit.source: Instances of the type can be created by <see langword="ITypeInfo::CreateInstance" />.
trans-unit.target: 可以由 <see langword="ITypeInfo::CreateInstance" /> 建立的型別的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The type is a control from which other types will be derived, and should not be displayed to users.
trans-unit.target: 型別是衍生其他型別的控制項，而且不應該向使用者顯示。

trans-unit.source: Indicates that the interface derives from <see langword="IDispatch" />, either directly or indirectly.
trans-unit.target: 指示介面是從 <see langword="IDispatch" /> 直接或間接衍生的。

trans-unit.source: The interface supplies both <see langword="IDispatch" /> and V-table binding.
trans-unit.target: 介面同時提供 <see langword="IDispatch" /> 和 V-table 繫結。

trans-unit.source: The type should not be displayed to browsers.
trans-unit.target: 型別不應顯示到瀏覽器。

trans-unit.source: The type is licensed.
trans-unit.target: 型別已經授權。

trans-unit.source: The interface cannot add members at run time.
trans-unit.target: 介面在執行階段不能加入成員。

trans-unit.source: The types used in the interface are fully compatible with Automation, including vtable binding support.
trans-unit.target: 介面中使用的型別與 Automation 完全相容，包括 vtable 繫結支援。

trans-unit.source: The type is predefined.
trans-unit.target: 型別已預先定義。

trans-unit.source: The client application should automatically create a single instance of the object that has this attribute.
trans-unit.target: 用戶端應用程式應該自動建立具有這項屬性之物件的單一執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The name of the variable that points to the object is the same as the class name of the object.
trans-unit.target: 指向該物件的變數名稱與該物件的類別名稱相同。

trans-unit.source: The object supports <see langword="IConnectionPointWithDefault" />, and has default behaviors.
trans-unit.target: 物件支援 <see langword="IConnectionPointWithDefault" />，而且具有預設的行為。

trans-unit.source: This flag is intended for system-level types or types that type browsers should not display.
trans-unit.target: 這個旗標是供系統層級的型別或型別瀏覽器不應顯示的型別使用。

trans-unit.source: Indicates base interfaces should be checked for name resolution before checking child interfaces.
trans-unit.target: 指示應在檢查子介面前檢查基底介面的名稱解析。

trans-unit.source: This is the reverse of the default behavior.
trans-unit.target: 這和預設行為相反。
